pkgmetadata.longdescription: SAGA is the abbreviation for System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses SAGA is a Geographic Information System (GIS) software SAGA has been designed for an easy and effective implementation of spatial algorithms SAGA offers a comprehensive, growing set of geoscientific methods SAGA provides an easily approachable user interface with many visualisation options SAGA runs under Windows and Linux operating systems SAGA is a Free Open Source Software (FOSS)
